named-query.name: findGebruikerByEmailAdres
named-query.query: select g from Gebruiker g where g.emailAdres = :emailAdres

named-query.name: findKaraktersByGebruiker
named-query.query: select k from Karakter k where k.gebruiker = :gebruiker

named-query.name: findKaraktersByLokatie
named-query.query: select k from Karakter k where k.lokatie = :lokatie

named-query.name: findAllLokaties
named-query.query: select l from Lokatie l order by l.id

named-query.name: findItemsByEigenaar
named-query.query: select distinct i from Item i join i.eigenaars e where e = :eigenaar

named-query.name: findAllKarakters
named-query.query: select k from Karakter k order by k.id

named-query.name: findAllDifferentItems
named-query.query: select distinct i.omschrijving from Item i order by i.omschrijving
